section.heading: Nature of transferable interest.
section.text: A transferable interest is personal property.

annotations.annotation: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-210 substituted “is” for “shall be.”
annotations.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 501 of the Uniform Limited Company Act (2006 Act).
Application of Law 19-210: Section 7 of D.C. Law 19-210 provided that the act shall apply as of January 1, 2012.
